SEARCH
Module com.example.demo
Package com.example.demo.level

Class LevelParent

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
com.example.demo.level.LevelParent
Direct Known Subclasses:
LevelFour, LevelOne, LevelThree, LevelTwo
public abstract class LevelParent extends Observable
Abstract class representing a parent level in the game. This class provides common functionality for all levels, including handling user input, updating the scene, and managing game state.

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelParent

      public LevelParent(String backgroundImageName, double screenHeight, double screenWidth, int playerInitialHealth, Music music, SoundEffect soundEffect)
      Constructs a LevelParent object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      backgroundImageName - the name of the background image file
      screenHeight - the height of the screen
      screenWidth - the width of the screen
      playerInitialHealth - the initial health of the player
      music - the music manager
      soundEffect - the sound effect manager

  • Method Details

    • checkIfGameOver

      protected abstract void checkIfGameOver()
      Abstract method to check if the game is over. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define specific game over conditions.

    • spawnEnemyUnits

      protected abstract void spawnEnemyUnits()
      Abstract method to spawn enemy units. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define specific enemy spawning behavior.

    • instantiateLevelView

      Abstract method to instantiate the level view. This method should be implemented by subclasses to define specific level view instantiation.
